body:
at the end of the vid he calls the current client a piece of shit.
its the first time in 3 years that i heard vandiril call something riot did literally shit.
he always jokes like its bad or spaghetti code or something, but this is the first time he called it straight up shit

replies.body: That's what you get when your goals are "easier for us to work on," "provide a way for people to give us money," and "contain lots of advertising for merch and pro play." Performance and stability were not primary concerns.

> [{quoted}](name=Arammus,realm=EUW,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=RhAlA5gT,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-01T03:40:16.670+0000)
>
> at the end of the vid he calls the current client a piece of shit.

Shows a clip of him playing the same game twice, with the old client, and calls the current client shit. Makes sense.

In what, exactly, is the new one "shit"? In what did the old one excel at compared to this one?
Mind you, we're talking about the main client, not the ingame one. The client upgrade is the reason why we can have cool shit like: skin collection, ranked stats, new gamemodes on the fly, transitioning from one game mode to the other without leaving party, etc

I'm really curious to know exactly what the old client did better.
######The new client is noticeably more laggy because it's heavier. If that's the only thing the old one did better, then... yeah.

idk if youre trolling or serious lol but the new client was made by mordekaiser as both share a similar amount of bugs and error. 

since im too lazy, https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/3TdcZLK4-its-frankly-an-embarrassment-how-bad-of-a-state-the-client-is-left-in have this link and enjoy.

as vandiril and other said: old client was ugly and not the best, but at least it was able to do the most basic things correct.

and one more thing: all the "cool shit" you mentioned is the type of stuff that bugs out half the time.
just the fact that for 4 months straight it said i own wardskins i dont have and several ward skins i apparently owned more than 10 times. THE SAME SKIN TEN TIMES

and new gamemodes on the fly? dont make me laugh you seem to be stuck in season 7 lol
